vikram.connect.com.connect

Class SelectActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • vikram.connect.com.connect.SelectActivity

  • public class SelectActivity
extends java.lang.Object
    Activity is first screen user sees on opening the app Activity is basically a RecyclerView with button on bottom RecyclerView is inflated with data user has stored on his/her phone
